pageProps.content: ["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"执行以下命令即可将 Composer 默认仓库设置为本站："}],"\n",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"composer config -g repos.packagist composer {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/index","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"\n",["$r","p",null,{"children":"该镜像只包含包索引，不含包的内容，主要目的是加快 composer 读取软件包索引的速度。"}]]}]

meta.title: Packagist 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
